abstract: General Electric’s finance unit reported a 216 percent gain in first-quarter profit, as the division continued to stabilize and move away from risky lending.
snippet: General Electric’s finance unit reported a 216 percent gain in first-quarter profit, as the division continued to stabilize and move away from risky lending.
lead_paragraph: Once the boulder that weighed down General Electric, the conglomerate’s gigantic financial unit, GE Capital, has rebounded in a big way.

headline.main: GE Capital’s Profit Surges in 1st Quarter

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
